name: FLOWSHEET_IMG_LINK
description: This table contains information about Document (DCS) records that represent images that are linked to flowsheets documentation.

columns.name: ID_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the flowsheet data record record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: DOC_INFO_ID
columns.description: Networks to document records to store image links for image type rows.
